text:
[Verse]
Woke up in the morning
Neon lights all around
People rushing so fast
No time to slow it down

[Verse 2]
Feel the beat in my chest
City never sleeps
Lost in the frenzy
Dreaming in the streets

[Chorus]
Lost in the city
Can't find my way
Lost in the city
Here I'll stay

[Verse 3]
Skyscrapers reaching high
Touching the sky
Traffic roaring by
City's lullaby

[Bridge]
Night lights are calling
Shadows in the breeze
In this urban jungle
Gonna find my peace

[Chorus]
Lost in the city
Can't find my way
Lost in the city
Here I'll stay
title: Lost in the City
